name: Add new Facebook Lead Ads leads as subscribers in MailerLite
description: Effortlessly manage your leads with this template that connects Facebook Lead Ads and MailerLite. Every time a new lead is generated through your Facebook Lead Ads, Make will automatically create or update a subscriber in your MailerLite email marketing platform. This streamlined workflow ensures that your email list is always up-to-date, allowing you to engage with potential customers promptly and effectively. Perfect for marketers looking to enhance their lead nurturing process and improve their email campaigns.
